-- | Enumerator-based API for libXML's SAX interface
--   
--   Enumerator-based API for libXML's SAX interface
@package libxml-enumerator
@version 0.5


module Text.XML.LibXML.Enumerator
parseBytesIO :: MonadIO m => Bool -> Maybe Text -> Enumeratee ByteString Event m b
parseBytesST :: Bool -> Maybe Text -> Enumeratee ByteString Event (ST s) b
